# BuildCBS Content Library - Reference Documentation

**Purpose:** This directory contains all source content used to build [buildcbs.co.za](https://buildcbs.co.za)
**Created:** January 2026
**Generated by:** John @ YourDesign.co.za

---

## Quick Reference

| Component | Source File/Folder |
|-----------|-------------------|
| Website specs | `SPEC-website.md` |
| All copy/text | `SPEC-buildcbs.md` |
| Logo & favicon | `logo-design/` |
| Project images | 11 project folders |

---

## How This Content Built the Website

### 1. Technical Implementation (SPEC-website.md)

This specification defined:
- **Tech stack:** Tailwind CSS 3.x + PHP 8.0+ + PHPMailer 6.x
- **Design system:** Brand colors, typography, spacing
- **Page structure:** index.php, projects.php, contact.php
- **Components:** Navbar, footer, WhatsApp button, project cards, lightbox gallery
- **SEO setup:** Meta tags, sitemap.xml, robots.txt, image optimization

### 2. Website Copy (SPEC-buildcbs.md)

All text content came from this file:
- Hero messaging and taglines
- Service descriptions (decking, renovations, outdoor areas, interior finishes)
- 11 project portfolio descriptions
- Contact information and form labels
- Brand voice and tone guidelines

**Key Business Details:**
- Owner: Paulis Barnard
- Phone: 074 651 5327
- Email: support@buildcbs.co.za
- Service Area: Mossel Bay, George, Glentana, Vleesbaai, Pinnacle Point, Heiderand

### 3. Brand Assets (logo-design/)

| File | Used For |
|------|----------|
| web-logo.png | Primary navigation logo |
| web-logo-01.png | Alternative/footer logo |
| favicon.jpg | Browser tab icon |
| hero-image.jpg | Homepage background |
| Facebook Cover.jpg | Social media presence |

### 4. Project Portfolio Images (11 folders)

Each folder contains Before/After photography used in the projects gallery:

| Project | Images | Material/Type |
|---------|--------|---------------|
| Balau Deck | 10 | Balau hardwood pool deck |
| Beachfront Garapa Deck - Vleesbaai | 10 | Garapa deck restoration |
| Bedroom Renovation | 6 | Interior accessibility upgrade |
| Deck at the famous Mosaic Tunnel | 4 | Scenic trail decking |
| Garapa dek MB Golf Estate | 3 | Premium golf estate deck |
| Garapa Pool Deck - Pinnacle Point | 7 | Pool surround revival |
| Garapa staircase - Glentana | 5 | Beach access staircase |
| Pizza oven and braai area | 8 | Outdoor entertainment space |
| PVC Ceilings | 12 | Interior ceiling finishes |
| The White House - Glentana | 14 | Full exterior restoration |
| Vleesbaai Pine Deck | 9 | Coastal deck & walkway |

**Image Organization:**
- `After/` subfolder = completed project photos
- `Before/` subfolder = pre-work condition photos
- PDF in each folder = detailed project description

## Directory Structure

```
extracted2/
├── README.md                 # This file
├── SPEC-website.md          # Technical implementation spec
├── SPEC-buildcbs.md         # All website copy and content
├── about_template.md        # Reference template (not used directly)
│
├── logo-design/             # Brand assets
│   ├── web-logo.png
│   ├── web-logo-01.png
│   ├── favicon.jpg
│   ├── hero-image.jpg

│
```

## Design System Reference

From SPEC-website.md:

**Brand Colors:**
- Orange (Primary): #F5A623
- Charcoal: #3D4550
- Dark: #2D3339
- Light: #F8F9FA

**Typography:**
- Headings: Inter (600-700 weight)
- Body: Inter (400-500 weight)

---

## Notes

- `about_template.md` is reference only (from UK outdoor deck company) - not used directly
- Project PDFs all named "Untitled document-8.pdf" - content varies per project
- Some image filenames are UUIDs, others are iPhone exports (IMG_XXXX format)
- The `.claude/` folder contains Claude Code permissions for image copying operations

---

## Related

The actual website built from this content should be in a separate directory (likely under `/opt/lampp/htdocs/` or similar web root).
